description:
Sit-and-get training models are dead. A new generation of recruits and employees are demanding individualized training that meets their demanding schedules while maintaining rigorous training standards. Join flipped learning expert Jon Bergmann as he shares how employee training programs can implement a flipped learning system which maximizes instructor-led time, ensures learner competencies, and provides meaningful feedback. In this course you will learn how the flipped classroom model is being applied in the world of business. You will learn:

  • Why businesses should consider flipped learning for training
  • Best practices in flipped learning
  • Explore case studies from a variety of businesses that have flipped their training
  • Learn how to design flipped lessons
  • Learn some of the tech tools necessary to flip training
  • Learn how to flip meetings so they don't suck
title: Flipped Learning for Businesses
